WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
When running the CSAutomateExcel I can see that the Excel COM object isn't released,
and it still alive in the Task Manager.
 
I got the same behaviour in my app, and I have no idea how to fix it.
 
The Word COM Object released fine.
 
Any ideas?
 
Thanks.

Comments.Message:
Hello

This is usually caused by RCW object not being released: http://blogs.msdn.com/b/geoffda/archive/2007/09/07/the-designer-process-that-would-not-terminate-part-2.aspx. You can follow this blog to diagnose the problem.

However, in the CSAutomateExcel sample, I provided two solutions to free all RCW objects. You can find the solutions in Solution1.cs and Solution2.cs. Did you see the problem in Solution1 or solution2? 

What's your Office version?

Hi,

I can see the problem both in solution1.cs & solution2.cs.

my office version is 2007.

Any clue..??

Hello
I cannot reproduce this problem on my side. abypt, could you please follow this article http://blogs.msdn.com/b/geoffda/archive/2007/09/07/the-designer-process-that-would-not-terminate-part-2.aspx to diagnose the issue? If you have any questions about the article, please feel free to tell me. 

Does anyone else see the same problem?
